titleStmt.title: The first set beeing songs of diuers ayres and natures, of [f]iue and sixe parts, apt for vyols and voyces / newly composed by Thomas Vautor ...
Songs of divers ayres and natures, voices (5-6)
titleStmt.author: Vautor, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham, for Matthew Lownes and Iohn Browne,

notesStmt.note: Each part has special t.p. and pts. 3, 5, and 6 have 1620 imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
